title: Second Date Update: What Ghosts Around Comes Around
itunes:title: Second Date Update: What Ghosts Around Comes Around
description: Is it okay to tell a real life ghost story on a first date? One of our listeners did and might have scared off his date... Now he wants our help getting her back!
